item.title: Vpns Scam
item.description: VPNs are everywhere and they claim to be secure and safe however there are only two reasons why one would want a VPN: Getting around Geo-blocks Torrents Why do I say that? VPNs advertise you to be secure and to encrpyt traffic between you and the internet so your ISP doesn’t see what you are doing however when you use a VPN, the VPN providor can see what you are doing so the “security” part fails anyways.
